name: The Judgement of Q
description:
In an alternate reality, using a keyboard and a mouse, despite the danger of dissolving to nothing again, the player chose to transform potential into actuality, in a space of possibility he will try every key and every combination of keys until he forms an ultimate map of this new reality.



The Judgement of Q is a 2.5D puzzle game, as a being, you found yourself in a new reality, you must discover what keys you can use and what keys you must NOT EVER use, you’re restricted to just a keyboard and a mouse, and after discovering enough inputs to progress, you’re confronted with a series of puzzles which reveal more and more about the laws of this new nature.

The Story of the game is the ultimate puzzle that the player is supposed to solve, use your understanding of the puzzle systems and the story audio logs which should add up at the end to the full picture.
